page.title: 13EVENING CLASSES & LIBRARY
page.content: Evening classes are well attended and have been held recently on {Dressmaking Keep Fit {Art Gaelic {Marine Biology Flowers of Argyll {Geology {Archaeology An{adult library}is kept in School with books changed evey three months. The island has so much which is of {scientific interest to specialists that we have made{lists}with their help of some of the{plants, birds, {butterflies}etc. which can be found on the island. We have put these lists into square {01840738}though they apply to the whole of the island.
